Name: Physics: Principles with Applications, Volume I: Chapters 1-15, 6th Edition

ReviewList.Text: Recommended for beginners and intermediate. The conceptual questions are challenging and interesting. This book is simple in explaining the materials.

The book is very confusing, so are the formulas. My professor doesn't speak English so I'm teaching myself, the problem is the mastering physics homework doesn't explain anything if you get it wrong or show you how to do the problems, and not every problem comes with a hint. You get -3% each time you submit a wrong answer. Take a good professor- this book is Terrible.

I love how cheap the book was, but the title says it comes with Mastering Physics and it didnt so that confused me. Maybe they should rename it without the mastering physics on it next time. Overall good book though!

I use this book in my *gasp* physics class! it does a pretty good job so far of explaining and illustrating the theories covered.It would be nice to have a hardcover for durability but no problems so far!
the book was as described and it was sent to my house relatively quickly under 1 week. and on the plus side as well it was sent with someones notes for the later chapters.
Well-presented material with easy to understand examples. Answers to odd-numbered questions provided, as is fairly standard; quite helpful. Definitely recommend!
This book was in very good condition when I received it and it arrived on time. It was exactly what I needed for my class.
the book came in great condition...though i dont personally like the setup. overall a good buy for a college student.
Physics at its best! too bad it's broken into 2 parts, the 2nd part is a little bit more expensive.
Excellent Book, Nice Condition, Speedy Shipping, Quality Item, Highly Recommend AAA++++++

I reeeeeeally didn't like this book, and I'm not sure it helped me out much for class at all. The text goes into explaining some of the basic theories/laws/principles etc., and helps explain a few of the ways that you can apply what you've just read, but then these crazy questions come out of nowhere that you end up getting assigned for homework that leave you utterly confused. They're extremely difficult, and you won't even know where to start. If you're anything like me, after buying this book, you're going to spend a significant amount of time on Yahoo answers.

I bought this package for my physics class.  I did not end up using the book hardly at all, but I did use Mastering Physics.  I thought the Mastering Physics website was helpful for practicing because you get multiple tries so that you can learn how to do things and it sometimes offers hints on challenging problems.

Be careful not to buy the wrong set of chapters. I bought the book second hand and was told the text was comprehensive. Upon receiving it, I only had the basic and obvious chapters/concepts and was missing the more complex chapters where a reference would be more important.
it was in amazing condition. I loved the book..i ordered with the code, i didnt need it later. But the book has no scratch or anything at all.
This book costs 80+$ when new. 40$ for a used book in this condition is a fair price and an economical alternative for a student. Thanks!
